attributes.action: Redress the unfair effect of removing the 10% tax rate for people on low incomes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Redress the effect of the removal of the 10% income tax band for low earners, part-time workers and pensioners on low incomes who will be paying even more tax while those with higher incomes will become better off.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
